Author: rebelmike
Content: If you can find the source for the build, you'll probably want to look in `ports/<whatever it's called>/uart_core.c`

Author: rebelmike
Content: Ctrl-C handling is port specific, as it requires the uart driver to be able to flag a Ctrl-C character has been seen before uP has processed the buffer
